cab.content: [THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITAHNIO, MAJESTY'S GCVgRMMgHT ]\ SECRET.Memorandum by the, Minister of Agriculture and Fisheries;,,With reference to the Report of the Tithe Rentcharge Committee which has been circulated (C.P, 228 (25)), I am anxious to introduce the Tithe Bill at as early a date as possible in order to afford to all the interests affected time for consideration of this very difficult subject. I do not know whether in view of the fact that the matter has been carefully considered by the Tithe Rentcharge Committee the Cabinet will consider it necessary to refer the Bill to the Home Affairs Committee, but if they do I would be grateful if it might be so referred without delay.CP. 251 (25) ,Copy No,CABINETTithe Bill,E.P.L.W.Ministry of Agriculture and Fisheries 8th May, 1925.
